generatedSources.name: #utility.yul

arguments.value: Web2 course ID cannot be empty
Ownable: new owner is the zero a
Ownable: caller is not the owner

deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Web2 course ID cannot be empty"

arguments.value: Web2 course ID cannot be empty

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Web2 course ID cannot be empty"

devdoc.details: 一灯教育课程市场合约 管理课程的添加、购买和完成认证流程

CourseAdded(uint256,string,string).details: 课程添加事件，当新课程被添加到市场时触发

CourseCompleted(address,uint256,uint256).details: 课程完成事件，当学生完成课程并获得证书时触发

CoursePurchased(address,uint256,string).details: 课程购买事件，当用户购买课程时触发

addCourse(string,string,uint256).details: 添加新课程到市场 只有合约所有者可以调用此函数

batchVerifyCourseCompletion(address[],st.details: 批量验证课程完成 允许一次性为多个学生验证课程完成并发放证书

hasCourse(address,string).details: 检查用户是否已购买课程

returns._0: bool 如果用户已购买该课程则返回true

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

purchaseCourse(string).details: 用户购买课程 用户需要先授权合约使用其YD代币

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

verifyCourseCompletion(address,string).details: 验证课程完成并发放证书 只有合约所有者可以调用此函数，确认学生已完成课程

devdoc.title: CourseMarket
